title: The best online shopping deals this weekend: COVID vaccination card holders, Le Creuset cookware, mattress sales
body:
Some of the noteworthy deals this weekend include COVID-19 vaccination card holders and lanyards; Le Creuset’s “Factory to Table” sale and the Coach X Disney princess-inspired collection.
